attributes.review: I have never seen an app so bad in my life. This app took WEEKS to download. When it finally downloaded it was okay the first few weeks. Then I started getting calls about the app... Weird calls. Demonic calls! I had never been so scared in my life. I tried to delete the app only to revive an email with MY house address. Someone had found my house address and threatened to come if I had tried to delete the app. For the past few weeks Iâ€™ve been trying to find a way to delete it. But Iâ€™ve been receiving bugs and DEAD animals in the mail!! You need to remove this app from the App Store before its to late. I hope the people doing this to me donâ€™t find out about this review. Iâ€™m never downloading this app again. But I have found a way to delete bringing me happiness and joy. Any 5 star reviews are LIES! They are trying to hide this and keep their secret from us. Please report 5 star reviews and get this app taken down!! We cannot let them pretend nothing is going on behind closed doors.
